newsitem.title: USA: SBS Technologies sees EPS shortfall.
newsitem.headline: SBS Technologies sees EPS shortfall.

text.p: SBS Technologies, Inc said on Monday it expected its third quarter results would be at the low end of analysts' estimates ranging from $0.31 to $0.36 per share, because of an unfavorable sales mix.
While SBS said it expected substantial increases in sales and net income due to recent acquisitions, earnings per share would not reach the mean of analysts' estimates.

"We expect our revenue to be in line with the average of analysts' expectations for the quarter," Christopher Amenson, chief executive officer, said. "However, a slightly unfavorable sales mix among our product lines will likely result in less favorable margins than analysts' expectations, and earnings per share at the low end of published estimates."
The company said its other businesses were growing and it continued to expand product development efforts and marketing and sales spending.
"We remain confident in our position in the markets we serve and in the strategy we are executing to achieve continued long term growth," Amenson said.
SBS Technologies makes embedded computer components.
